00045 #include <stdio.h>
00046 #include "conversion.h"
00047 #include "vi_table.h"
00048 #include "ueac.h"
00049 #include "filter.h"
00050 #include "global.h"
00051 
00052 // dig_a2d - 12-bit digital value returned from a2d
00053 // v_a2d - analog voltage at a2d pin
00054 // v_a2d = (3.3/4096) * dig_a2d
00055 // v_op = (v_a2d*2215)/715
00056 // (lla mode off) v_pin = v_op 
00057 // (lla mode on) v_pin = v_op/11
00058 // v_pin = (((3.3/4096)*dig_a2d)*2215)/715 
00059 // i_pin = (v_pin*1000)/11 (lookup table) 
00060 
00061 void convert_a2d(char value_type,unsigned short a2d_data,ueacval_t *return_val,int pin) {
00062   if (value_type==V_CONVERSION) {
00063     if (a2d_data < 400) {
00064       return_val->integer=0;
00065       return_val->hundredth=a2d_data>>2;
00066     }
00067     else if (a2d_data < 800) {
00068       return_val->integer=1;
00069       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-400)>>2;
00070     }
00071     else if (a2d_data < 1200) {
00072       return_val->integer=2;
00073       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-800)>>2;
00074     }
00075     else if (a2d_data < 1600) {
00076       return_val->integer=3;
00077       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-1200)>>2;
00078     }
00079     else if (a2d_data < 2000) {
00080       return_val->integer=4;
00081       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-1600)>>2;
00082     }
00083     else if (a2d_data < 2400) {
00084       return_val->integer=5;
00085       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-2000)>>2;
00086     }
00087     else if (a2d_data < 2800) {
00088       return_val->integer=6;
00089       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-2400)>>2;
00090     }
00091     else if (a2d_data < 3200) {
00092       return_val->integer=7;
00093       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-2800)>>2;
00094     }
00095     else if (a2d_data < 3600) {
00096       return_val->integer=8;
00097       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-3200)>>2;
00098     }
00099     else if (a2d_data < 4000) {
00100       return_val->integer=9;
00101       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-3600)>>2;
00102     }
00103     else {
00104       return_val->integer=10;
00105       return_val->hundredth=(a2d_data-4000)>>2;
00106     }
00107   }
00108   else {
00109     return_val->integer=a2d_i_conversion[a2d_data];
00110     if (pin<25) {
00111       if (return_val->integer<=ueac_state.pin_cal[pin].i_in_floor) {
00112         return_val->integer=0;
00113       }
00114       else {
00115         return_val->integer+=ueac_state.pin_cal[pin].i_in_offset;
00116       }
00117     }
00118     return_val->hundredth=0;
00119   }
00120 }
